added-queue: %%GREEN%%Added to sell center creation queue. Touch where you want to create.
added-rm-queue: %%GREEN%%Added sell center removal queue. Touch where you want to remove.
sell-create-failed: %%RED%%Failed to create sell center due to unknown reason.
no-permission-sell: %%RED%%You don't have permission to sell item.
no-item: You do not have enough item to sell %%RED%%%1%%RESET%%.
failed-sell: %%RED%%Failed to sell item due to unknown reason.
sold-item: You have bought item %2 of %%AQUA%%%1%%RESET%% for %%GOLD%%%MONETARY_UNIT%%3%%RESET%%.
